title: The Ninth Life
description: The Ninth Life is the story of struggling and ageing artist Kate Devereau's life as she tries to make sense of her often confusing existence. She needs to understand what has been happening to her, and why she seems to have cheated death on so many occasions.To understand why she has been plagued by the mysterious, tormenting voice in her head before it might be too late to do anything about it.
author: Jaye Marie
